backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data types (UserProfile, Transaction, BankAccount, Challenge, Feedback, SupportTicket) and CRUD endpoints for profile management, bank accounts, transactions, challenges, feedback, and leaderboard, with role-based access control and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades stored UserProfile records from the old schema (missing walletBalance) to the new schema by adding a default walletBalance of 0.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three wallet-related features (Home wallet section, Profile wallet section, QR code modal) to their implementation files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for component and hook responsibilities across the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the FinMate React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the TypeScript entry point via a module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing the full authentication and onboarding flow: Internet Identity login, PIN setup/entry, profile setup modal, and rendering MainApp once the user is authenticated and unlocked.
frontend/src/components/AdBanner.tsx: An auto-rotating advertisement banner carousel that cycles through 5 financial product ads every 4 seconds, with manual navigation arrows and dot indicators.
frontend/src/components/AddBankAccountMo: A modal dialog form for linking a new bank account, collecting bank name, account number, account type, and balance, then submitting via the useAddBankAccount mutation.
frontend/src/components/AdminFeedbackSec: An admin-only section that fetches and displays all user-submitted feedback entries with star ratings, messages, timestamps, and submitter principal IDs.
frontend/src/components/AdminSupportTick: An admin-only section that lists all support tickets with subject, description, ticket ID badge, submitter principal, and submission date.
frontend/src/components/AIChatbotFAB.tsx: Floating action button component that toggles the AIChatbotOverlay open or closed, displaying an AI avatar image with a fallback icon.
frontend/src/components/AIChatbotOverlay: A floating chat overlay component that renders a conversation UI with the FinMate AI assistant, supporting quick-reply buttons, markdown-style bold text rendering, and auto-scrolling messages.
frontend/src/components/BalanceCard.tsx: A card that shows the total balance across linked bank accounts, hidden by default behind a PIN confirmation modal, with auto-hide after 30 seconds of visibility.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: A fixed bottom navigation bar with four tabs (Home, History, Analytics, Profile) that highlights the active tab with an icon, label, and indicator dot.
frontend/src/components/CategoryBreakdow: Card component displaying a spending category with its icon, amount, percentage of total, and a trend indicator (up/down/neutral) with color-coded styling.
frontend/src/components/ChallengesSectio: Displays a list of spending/savings challenges with real-time progress calculated from transactions, a leaderboard button, and fallback mock challenges if none are loaded.
frontend/src/components/CIBILScoreSectio: Collapsible section displaying a simulated CIBIL credit score (742/900) with a gauge image, progress bar, score breakdown grid, and a list of improvement tips with impact levels.
frontend/src/components/CustomerFeedback: Feedback form with a 5-star rating selector and optional text area that submits via the useSubmitFeedback mutation, showing a thank-you confirmation on success.
frontend/src/components/FinMateWalletCar: Gradient wallet card showing balance (with show/hide toggle), wallet ID, and Send/Receive/QR action buttons that open WalletQRModal and ScanPayModal.
frontend/src/components/GetHelpSection.t: Collapsible help section with an FAQ accordion, a live chat support button, and a support ticket form that submits via useSubmitSupportTicket with a success confirmation state.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelectio: Collapsible language picker listing 9 languages with flags; persists the selection to localStorage and shows a notice that only English is currently supported.
frontend/src/components/LeaderboardModal: Displays a modal dialog showing a mock DigiPoints leaderboard with top 5 ranked users, and appends the currently logged-in user's rank and points at the bottom.
frontend/src/components/PinConfirmationM: Renders a PIN entry modal with a numeric keypad that verifies a 4-digit PIN using the usePinAuth hook, calling onSuccess on match or showing an error on failure.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A one-time profile setup modal that collects the user's name and optional email, then saves the profile via the saveCallerUserProfile mutation with a generated referral code.
frontend/src/components/RechargeModal.ts: A multi-step mobile recharge modal that lets users enter a phone number, select prepaid or postpaid plans, and confirm payment via PIN, ending with a success screen.
frontend/src/components/RewardsSection.t: An expandable card section displaying the user's referral code (with copy functionality) and a list of exclusive brand discount offers with copyable promo codes.
frontend/src/components/ScanPayModal.tsx: A send-money modal supporting QR code scanning (via camera), mobile number, or UPI ID input, with amount entry and PIN confirmation before completing the payment.
frontend/src/components/SecuritySettings: A modal dialog for security settings with tabs for changing PIN (via numpad flow) and managing active sessions, using mock session data and the usePinAuth hook.
frontend/src/components/SetLimitsModal.t: A modal dialog that allows users to set monthly spending limits per transaction category, with numeric inputs and save/cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/SpendingLimitsCa: A card component that displays per-category monthly spending progress bars against user-defined limits stored in localStorage, with a button to open the SetLimitsModal.
frontend/src/components/TicketBookingMod: A multi-step modal for booking bus, train, or flight tickets with mock route data, seat selection, PIN confirmation, and a success screen.
A presentational card component that displays a single transaction's category icon, merchant name, date, and color-coded debit/credit amount.
frontend/src/components/WalletQRModal.ts: A modal that renders a wallet ID as an SVG QR code (generated via a custom qrcode lib) and provides copy/share actions for receiving payments.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIChatbot.ts: Defines a React hook for a rule-based AI chatbot that matches user input keywords to predefined financial advice responses covering spending, investments, savings, budgeting, credit, and more.
frontend/src/hooks/useBeneficiaries.ts: Manages a list of payment beneficiaries (mobile/UPI) persisted in localStorage, exposing add and remove operations via a React hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication for ICP using AuthClient, providing a React context and hook with login, logout, and identity state management including delegation validity checks.
frontend/src/hooks/usePinAuth.ts: Handles PIN-based authentication with localStorage persistence using a simple hash, and exposes helpers for setting, verifying, and clearing the PIN as well as simulated biometric authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes React Query hooks for all backend data operations including user profile, bank accounts, and transactions, wrapping actor calls with proper caching and invalidation logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind CSS, and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes along with reusable component utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/qrcode.ts: A pure TypeScript QR code generator with no external dependencies that produces a 2D boolean matrix for a given string. Implements Reed-Solomon error correction and supports versions 1-10 in byte mode with error correction level L.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with React Query and Internet Identity authentication providers wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Analytics.tsx: Analytics page displaying spending breakdowns via pie and bar charts (Recharts) with weekly/monthly/yearly period toggles and demo data. Includes an AI chatbot panel with quick-reply suggestions powered by the useAIChatbot hook.
frontend/src/pages/History.tsx: Transaction history page with filtering by time period, category, transaction type (debit/credit), and a text search. Displays filtered transactions using TransactionCard components and shows total debit/credit summaries.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home dashboard page showing a greeting, wallet card, quick-action buttons (recharge, tickets, send money, balance), ad banner, spending limits, challenges, and customer feedback sections. Manages modal visibility state for several feature modals.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen presenting the FinMate branding, feature highlights, and an Internet Identity login button. Handles loading state during authentication and includes a footer attribution.
frontend/src/pages/MainApp.tsx: Root layout component that manages tab navigation state and renders the active page (Home, History, Analytics, or Profile) above a persistent BottomNav bar.
frontend/src/pages/PinEntry.tsx: PIN entry screen component that renders a numeric keypad, PIN dot indicators, error messages, and a biometric authentication button for unlocking the app.
frontend/src/pages/PinSetup.tsx: Two-step PIN setup screen where users create and confirm a 4-6 digit PIN, with a numeric keypad and validation logic.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Profile page displaying user info, bank accounts, leaderboard preferences, theme toggle, wallet QR modal, and logout; uses multiple query hooks to fetch and update data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters (supporting both standard and hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, shadows, and FinMate brand colors, plus typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking existing features (wallet section on Home/Profile, per-user QR code) and pending feature requests (backend walletBalance field, query hook updates) for the Fimate finance app.
